description: We've installed new ticket machines at 11 Bakerloo and District line stations

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["As part of our efforts to improve the Tube, we installed new ticket machines in 2017/2018 at several Bakerloo and District line stations. Ticket offices there have now closed. This means staff can move into ticket halls where they can help customers more effectively."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
We've finished the work at these stations:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Gunnersbury","Harlesden","Harrow \u0026 Wealdstone","Kensal Green","Kenton","Kew Gardens","North Wembley","Queen's Park","South Kenton","Stonebridge Park","Wembley Central"]}
Customers can use the new ticket machines to:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Get a new Oyster card","Add a 7 Day or Monthly season ticket to an Oyster card","See journey history","Buy or collect National Rail tickets as well as weekly and monthly Travelcards","Add a discount to an Oyster card (with staff assistance)"]}
Staff will be available to help customers buy tickets. They can also give information on current services, journey planning, ticket options and fares.
